sentences.en: A curl of black hair fell loosely across his forehead.
sentences.cn: 他的额头上垂着一绺散开的黑色卷发。

sentences.en: Applications that interact via messages have the advantage of being loosely coupled, because changes in one system have no impact on the other as long as both sides agree to the same message format.
sentences.cn: 通过消息进行交互的应用程序具有松散耦合的优点，因为只要双方使用相同的消息格式，那么一个系统中的更改就不会对另一个系统产生影响。

sentences.en: Cover the chicken loosely with foil.
sentences.cn: 用锡箔把鸡肉松松地盖起来。

sentences.en: Don't use the word too loosely.
sentences.cn: 这个词不要用得太随便.

sentences.en: Finally, courts measure agency actions against a loosely defined " reasoned decisionmaking'standard.
sentences.cn: 最后, 法院针对界定宽松的 " 推理的决策 " 标准来衡量行政机关的行动.

sentences.en: He had lost weight and the suit hung loosely on him.
sentences.cn: 他瘦了,西装穿在身上松松垮垮的.

sentences.en: He wore plimsolls, loosely tied with bits of string.
sentences.cn: 他穿帆布鞋, 鞋带系得很松.

sentences.en: His shaggy grey hair fell loosely across his brow.
sentences.cn: 他凌乱的白发蓬松地搭在额头.

sentences.en: His shirt hung loosely over his thin shoulders.
sentences.cn: 衬衫在他单薄肩膀的支撑下显得松松垮垮。

sentences.en: If you actually combine the best ideas of both, you end up with an extensible and modular and loosely coupled system.
sentences.cn: 如果你真的结合二者的最佳思想，就可以得到一个可扩展的、模块化的、松散耦合的系统。

sentences.en: She fastened the belt loosely around her waist.
sentences.cn: 她把皮带松松地系在腰上。

sentences.en: The book follows four characters, loosely based on my uncles.
sentences.cn: 该书描述了4个角色，大致上以我的几个叔叔为原型。

sentences.en: The dress sits loosely on her.
sentences.cn: 这身衣服她穿着太旷了.

sentences.en: Tim clasped his hands together and held them loosely in front of his belly.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆双手紧扣，放松置于腹前。

sentences.en: You can achieve greater flexibility, adaptability, and independence when each layer is only loosely coupled to the layer above and below.
sentences.cn: 当每个层仅松散耦合到其上和其下的层时，您可以实现更强的灵活性、适应性和独立性。

words.tran_cn: 宽松的；散漫的；不牢固的；不精确的

trans.tran_cn: 松散的，蓬松的，轻易，轻松地，随手地，随意地，大意，粗略地，不严格的，无力地，软绵绵地
trans.tran_en: in a way that is not firm or tight
